channel.title: Projects on Gonzalo Parra Alvarez
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Gonzalo Parra Alvarez

item.title: Web Automation with Notifications
item.description: Overview: Python scripts to automate tasks on the browser. Useful for sites that do not have notifications or waiting lists. Goal is to avoid manual polling. Notifications on every platform thanks to an slack bot included. Project State: In development. Used Technologies: python for the scripts selenium as the core library to control the browser helium as an abstraction layer to interact with selenium bolt for python as the framework for the slack bot usind websocket slack API TODOs add more interactions with the slack bot.

item.title: Personal Web Presentation
item.description: Overview: A static website to showcase projects, inititatives, learnings and fun stuff. Project State: In development. Used Technologies: hugo a framework for building static websites coder template for the hugo framework github actions for automated deployment. github pages for hosting on my own domain. TODOs add more projects Source: The source code can be found on my github.
